description:
Deductible input tax

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73311 Turnover tax statistics (advance returns)
73321 Turnover tax statistics (assessments)

Definition:
For tax calculation, the entrepreneur can deduct from his
tax liability the turnover tax (as input tax) invoiced to
him separately by other enterprises as part of business
transactions (see also Section 15 of the Turnover Tax Law).
Deductible input tax includes import turnover tax paid on
imports performed for business purposes and the tax on
intra-Community acquisition.
